title: Getting started with Agathon
excerpt: Quick steps to get your first board, invite students, and run a session.
content:
# Getting started with Agathon

Welcome! This guide helps you set up a board, invite collaborators, and run your first session.

1. Create a board from the dashboard.
2. Invite students via email or share a public link.
3. Use the Math Editor to create problems.
4. Start a live session and use the tutor tools.

If you run into issues, use the contact form on the Help Center home.
